about_the_game:
Deep space is waiting for you

Starting with a small research ship and a weak space station, become an admiral of a space fleet with strong fleets and powerful allies. Mine artifacts, explore technologies, build huge ships and stations and conquer worlds to achieve the main goal of the game – to uncover the history of the Galaxy and defeat an evil alien race that secretly threatens all living things

Take part in space battles

The star systems of the center of the Galaxy are full of threats and treasures. Defeat pirates and other enemies – hundreds of ship models are presented here, get loot and experience of officers, as well as improve their characteristics. Exchange your resources for more powerful space modules.

Make friends

There are many alien races and dozens of factions in the game – government agencies, merchants, builders, pirates, warriors, spies, archaeologists, builders, industrialists and many others. Send your diplomats to them and seek influence, missions and connections. The better the relationship, the better modules, drawings and other benefits you get.
Explore and exploit the center of the Galaxy
Planets contain resources. Build mining bases on uninhabited planets or trading stations for luxury resources and exchange with primitive peoples. Or, if they refuse, conquer them in land-grabbing campaigns!

Hire and upgrade officers

The game features more than 30 professions – from pilots and ship equipment craftsmen to merchants, diplomats and land generals. Alien races also have their drawbacks and advantages. Manage them in the most efficient way, increase their characteristics and privileges, raise their level, conduct research and install implants, and you will have the most powerful team in the Galaxy

Expand your fleet

You can buy spaceships and build them in your docks. Find blueprints, hire scientists and engineers, and explore alien ship building technologies that are hundreds of years ahead of Earth's capabilities.

Recommended:

short_description: The Rebel Space Admiral is an idler/ clicker game about space exploration with battles, trade, base building, planet invasions and science research. Fight your way through hundreds of star systems, meet aliens, find powerful artifacts and defeat an ancient evil before it purges the galaxy.
